# Info Wars (film)

| producer       = Parallel Universe
| writer         = Fate
| starring       = Jon Johansen  Robin GrossRay ThomasRicardo DominguezDouglas Rushkoffetoy.ZAIHans Bernhard (Ubermorgen)
| distributor    = Parallel Universe (world)Polyfilm (Austria)
| released       =
| runtime        = 69 min.
| language       = American English, Thai
}}
Info Wars (styled as info wars) is a 2004 documentary film that explores the mechanics of modern information warfare and media manipulation. The film examines how special interest groups influence mass media to serve their objectives and explains how control over information flow can shape the outcome of both real-world and digital conflicts.
The film is named after InfoWars, a media platform launched in 1999.
